---
name: Battlefortress
type: WE
speed: 30cm
armour: 4+
cc: 4+
ff: 4+
special_rules:
  - damage-capacity-3
  - transport
notes:
  |
    May transport eight infantry units without _Jump Packs_ or _Mounted_; only one of the eight units may be a Big Gunz; plus four units of Grotz. Critical Hit Effect: Move the unit D6cm in a random direction, all units under it suffer a hit. The unit is destroyed and all units being carried are destroyed unless they roll a 6+.
weapons:
  -
    id: twin-big-shoota
    multiplier: 4
  -
    id: big-gun
---
